welcome.title: Welcome to Forsh Fitness
welcome.body:
With me as your coach, you get a partner who dreams just as much about seeing a change in you as you do yourself. This means that your burning desire is also mine!

The quality of my plans is something I never compromise on. Therefore, I will always ensure that it suits you, your training location, and most importantly, your life.

Many people have a passion and a dream to achieve something in life with their training. Whether it's weight loss, muscle building, increased energy in daily life, general health, or mental strength, it all has an improving effect through training and a healthy lifestyle.

included.4: Workout plan adapted to your life
included.title: My coaching includes:

calculatorlead.title: Not sure where to start?
calculatorlead.body: Use my free calorie calculator now to figure out how much you need to eat to reach your goals.

about.title: Welcome to Forsh Fitness
about.body: My name is Jonas, and I am here to provide you with a value in life you didn't know you were missing. I started my own journey from scratch, and my goal with fitness was to build better self-confidence and improve my mental health.

background.title: My Background
background.body: Six years ago, I went through a severe depression. Fitness became my tool to get through it. It all started with a single push-up. That one push-up gave me an incredible feeling of having achieved something positive for myself. Slowly, I worked my way up to doing 100 push-ups a day.

mission.title: My Mission
mission.body: I want to share my journey, my knowledge, and my dedication with you. I want to help you move from where you are now to where you want to be, using fitness as an inspiring tool rather than a boring task.

whyme.title: Why Choose Me?
whyme.body: We all have only one chance in life to achieve our dreams. Why delay them? Let me help you take the first step towards a healthier and happier life.

beefit.title: Forsh Fitness
beefit.body: Fill out the form below to get a no-obligation call with me

step4.title: Are you ready to invest in yourself?

step5.title: Tell me a little about yourself..

submit.completetext: Thank you very much, I will contact you as soon as possible.
